disableVisionOnDragAsGM.name: Disable the token vision when is dragged from a GM
disableVisionOnDragAsGM.hint: Disables the vision limitation when dragging a token as a GM (Useful for not show the map to player when you move some token on the map)

noTokenAnimationAsGM.name: Disable Token Movement Animations for GM
noTokenAnimationAsGM.hint: Dragging and dropping tokens around the map will resolve instantly instead of sliding.

setting.blindTokensControllableHint: On scenes using Token Vision, can tokens without vision be controlled by players? If 'No' then hidden tokens, with no vision are hidden even from the owner.
setting.blindTokensControllableYES: Yes, Tokens with no vision can be controlled normally (Foundry standard)
setting.blindTokensControllableNO: No, Tokens without vision cannot be controlled by players
setting.hiddenCanLightHint: Should Hidden Tokens be able to radiate light?
setting.hiddenCanSeeHint: Should Hidden Tokens be able to see?
setting.hiddenCanSeeYES: Yes, hidden tokens may have vision
setting.hiddenCanSeeNO: No, hidden tokens have no vision (standard Foundry behavior)
